328b5(mdo sde): nisangs rgyas kyi thog ma'i phyi mo yi no// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mthog ma phyi mo sangs rgya sa thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sa bon// sems can thams cad la
328b6(mdo sde): yang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi skal pa yod do// thams cad kyi shes pa dang / kha dog dang / sems dang / yid dang / semaso cog thams cad kun kyang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi nang du
328b7(mdo sde): 'du sa// tshul khrims kyi nang na rtag pa yun tu rtag par bsod nams yod do// rtag par yun tu rtag par chos kyi lus yod// so sor bar pa 'di rnams bcu ni/ sangs rgyas
328b8(mdo sde): kyi dbyings nas/ chos kyi tshul khrims byas te/ dus gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyis gzungasu 'dzin no// ngas dmang po 'di'i phyi bzad pa'i mtha' med pa'i tshul
329a1(mdo sde): khrims kyi le'u bcu bslabs te bsha // rdzogs longs spyod pang bdag ste/ pad+mo'i dbus su gdong bzhugs nas/ mtha' bzhi'o me tog stong gi sdeng / 
329a2(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa stong du bzhugs// me tog gcig khams 'bum phrag brgya/ khams de gcig kyang sprul pa gcig/ kun kyang byang chub shing drung ba zhugs// mnyam par sangs rgyas
329a3(mdo sde): gan su som/ nga yang 'bum phrag brgya pa stong // rdzogs longs spyod pa rang bzhin lus// sprul pa 'bum phrag brgya stong po// kun kyang rdul phran mang por 'dren/ gcig car
329a4(mdo sde): nga yi gan su 'ongs// sangs rgyas nga yi tshul khrims nyom/ zil ngor sgo mo de nas bye/ 'ung nas 'bum phrag ba rgya stong po// slang du ga tsang ma'i gan su phyin// kun kyang byang
329a5(mdo sde): chub shing drung bzhugs/ nga yi mkhan po tshul khrims kha don lhogs// tshul khrims chen po rta gas par lnga bcu brgyad // tshul khrim snang khyad gnyi zla
329a6(mdo sde): 'azhim/ gcig tu nor bu yang nyo 'dra// byang chub sems dpa' rdul phran bzhin// 'di yi yon gyis yang dag 'grul// gdong ma rdzogs longs spyod pa nyid kyis klags// ngas kyang
329a7(mdo sde): de bzhin kha thon klags// byang chub sems dpal gsar slob pa// glang la khyer zhing khrims bzung bzhin// thub bzhin gcig tu sems can ston// nga yi bde glags rtag
329a8(mdo sde): parangon// sangs rgyas chos rnams tshul khrims snod // sa sor thar pa shes rab pa ni ni// mang po yang kun brtag par ches khyed rnams sas rgyas phyin par 'ong // nga yi sangs rgyu
329b1(mdo sde): byin zin kyang / rtag par 'di bzhin yid ches byed// tshul khrims le'u kun cho ga tshang yin/ yid sems yod pa thams cad ni// kun kyang sangs rgyas khrims kyis bsdu// se na sa
329b2(mdo sde): rgyas khrims gnod pa// de nas sangs rgyas sa ru phyin// tsher chen sa dang mtshungs zin te// sangs rgyas kun gyi bu yang dag/ mang po kun gyis gus par byas// sem gcig brtul te
329b3(mdo sde): glog nyen// de'i tsha na shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas// thog ma byang chub shing drung bzhugs// bla na med pa'i g.yung drung rdzogs pa'i byang chubo// byang chub sems dpa'i thog ma so so
329b4(mdo sde): thar pa'i mdud pa na pa ma dang / dge 'dun dang / dko na mchog gsum la sr-i zhu dang // ying dang mi 'gal bar bya'o// sri zhu byas te bla ma yid dang mi 'gal ba ni/ chos zab mo
329b5(mdo sde): thub pa'i gzhung ste/ sr-i nu'i ming ni tshul khrimaso// ming gcig tu ni sdom pa dang / gtong ba'o// de nas 'od snang ba grangs med pa 'byu'o// de'i tshe/ 'bum phrag brgya stong
329b6(mdo sde): mang po chags pa byang chub sems dpa' rnam dang / gzugs yod pa'i kham kyi gnas bco brgyad dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnam rim pa drug ming dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thal
329b7(mdo sde): mo sbyar te/ sem gcig tu mnyan nas/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims chen po klags te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam la bka' stsal gang da ltar zla ba phyed phyed cing bdag gis sangs
329b8(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kha ton tu klogo// khyed la sogs pa thog ma sem+ba bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md kyis kyang / kha ton tu lhogs shig/ sems g.yo te phyog pa
330a1(mdo sde): // bcu dpa gal zhing bskyed pa bcu dang / rdo rje bcud pas bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang kha can tu lhogs shi ga/ 'ung ni tshul khrims kyi 'ong kho nas hUM
330a2(mdo sde): ste rgyu yod rkyen med pa'i 'ong ma yin te/ 'od sngon po dang / dmar po/ ser godakar po nag po yang ma yin kha dog kyang ma yin/ sems kyang ma yin yod pa yang ma yin/ med
330a3(mdo sde): pa yang ma yim rgyu rkyen gyi chos kyang ma yin te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni gdong ma phyi mo// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi no lam gyi rtsa ba bas na mang po thaMng
330a4(mdo sde): dang sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams kyi rtsa ba'i phyi mo zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams kyis kyang gzungasu bzung ba'i rog so// legs par brlabs pa'i ro
330a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams 'jas par can cig/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims dong na ni rgyam po dang / rgyal bu dang / zlum pa ma phra dang / dge slong po mas dang / gzugs kyi khams kyi
330a6(mdo sde): gnam bco brgyad dang / 'dod pa'i khams rnam drug dang / gdol pa dang / nyid grub dang / po g.yeng dang mo g.yeng dang bran po smos dang / lha ma srin sde brgyad dang / phyag bstan dang / byol song dang
330a7(mdo sde): 'phrul zhing 'gyur ba'i po la sogs te/ chos kyi mkhan po'i tshig mda' phrad pa'i rnams thams cad tshul khrims mnod du rung ste/ kun kyang ming rab tu gtsang ma zhes bya'o// sangs rgyas
330a8(mdo sde): kyis sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ ma mar thar pa las dam pa bcu yong // sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims nos pa ni tshul khrims 'di kha ton tu ma klags na byang chub
330b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi sa bon yang ma yi meng yang 'di bzhin du kha ton tu klog go/ lobs zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / phyis slob pa'i
330b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / da ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ngas so sor thar pa'i gzungs kyi mdo tsam zhig bshad kyis/ bslab cing gzung
330b3(mdo sde): su bzung ba'i rog so// sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams la bka' stsal pa// bdag gis bsad pa dang / mi gzhan gsong du bcug pa dang / thams cad kyis gsod pa la
330b4(mdo sde): sdo pa/ gsod pa mthong na dga' bar sems pa/ sngags dang / rngang mo byas te/ bsang pa/ gsad pa'i rgyu/ gsad pa'i rkyen/ gsad pa'i chos byed pa/ gsod pa'i las byed pa la
330b5(mdo sde): sogs te/ sems yod do cog la ched kar ga sad du mi rung / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni rtag par snying rje ba dang / sri zhu che zhing mo 'gal ba'i sems
330b6(mdo sde): rtag par g.yos te/ bags kyis sems can thams cad kyi ra mda' dang / 'or pa bya ba'i rog so// bdag gis rang nyams byams te/ snying tshim par sems can bsad na
330b7(mdo sde): de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nges pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag gis ma byin par blangs sam/ pha rol po ma byin par len tu bcug gam/ thabs kyis ma byin par blangs
330b8(mdo sde): sam/ ma byin par len pa'i rgyu/ ma byin par len pa'i rkyen/ ma byin par len pa'i las byed pa/ sngags sgyum byas te/ nor khyer ba la sogs te/ lha ma srin dang / bdag po yo
331a1(mdo sde): // pa dang / yang klo'i nor rdzas dang / nor rdzaso cog la kha ba dang / rtswa 'ag ma gcig langs ched kar ma byin par blangasu mi ru // byang chub sems dpa' mi sangs rgyas
331a2(mdo sde): kyi rang bzhin skyed la/ sri zhu'i yid dang mo 'gal zhing / byams shing snying rje bar byas te/ rtag par sems can no cog yon tan dang / bsod nams bskyed pa'i rogs so// / 
331a3(mdo sde): la slar log par mo'o nor rdzas ma byin par blangs na byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag mi tshangs par spyod dam/ gzhan yang mi 'ongs par
331a4(mdo sde): sbyang bar bstan nas/ bud med do cog la mtsho ngas par sbyong bar byed pa dang / gzhan la mtshangs par spyod pa dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa'i rgyu dang / mi tshangs pa
331a5(mdo sde): spong pa'i rkyen dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa'i chos byed pa dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa'i las byed pa dang / byol song dang / lha dang lha ma yin gyi bu mo la
331a6(mdo sde): mi tshangs par spyod pa dang / chos dpa' gal ba'i mo tshangs par spyod na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ni sro zhu dang / mi 'gal ba'i sems kyi sems can thams cad thar pa'i
331a7(mdo sde): ra mnga' bya zhi // chos gtsang ma gzhan la sbyin pa'i rog so// de la sngar mi'o cog la mi tshangs par spyod pa bskyed de/ byol song dang / ma dang bu mo dang / sring mo la sogs
331a8(mdo sde): gnyem pa drug la mi tshangs par sbyong ba byas to// byams shing rje ba med na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag gis brdzun byas sam/ 
331b1(mdo sde): po brdzun zer bar bstan tam/ thabs kyis brdzun byas pa dang / brdzun gyi rgyu byas pa dang / brdzun gyi rkyen byas pa dang / brdzun gyi chos byed pa dang / brdzun gyi las byed pa dang / 
331b2(mdo sde): mthong ba la ma mthong zhes zer ma mthong ba la ni mthong zhes ze ba lus dang sems kyis brdzun byas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ni rtag par tshig drang po skye zhing / gcig tu
331b3(mdo sde): sems can gyi chog drang po bskyed pa yin na/ de la slar log pa'i sems can thams cad kyi chog mi drang ba dang / yon po la lta ba dang / yon po'i las byed par bskyed na/ 
331b4(mdo sde): de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu spro ba'i khu ba bdag 'tshong ngam pa log pa skyo ba'i khu ba 'tshong bar bstan tam/ thabs kyis
331b5(mdo sde): smos pa'i khu ba mchong ngam/ sngo ba'i khu ba 'tsho nga ba'i rgyu byed dam/ smyo ba'i khu ba 'tshong ba'i rkyen byed dam/ smyo bo'i khu ba 'tshong ba'i chos byed dam/ skyo ba'i khu ba
331b6(mdo sde): 'tshong ba'i las byed pa la sogs te/ spro ba'i khu ba'o cog 'o tshong du mi rung / slo ba'i khu ba'i rkyen gyis kha na ma tho ba skye'o// byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad la
331b7(mdo sde): snang zhing / thar pa'i shes rab bskyed pa'i rigs na/ slar log par son thams cad kyi phyin ci log gi sems bskyed na byang chub sem pa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu rab tu byung ba dang ma byung
331b8(mdo sde): 'dang byang chub se bla pa' dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma'i nyes pa bdag gis 'phyasu byas sam/ gzhan 'phyas byed par bstan tam/ 'phya ba'i rgyu byas sam/ 'phya ba'i rkyen byas sam/ 'phya nga
332a1(mdo sde): / chos dnga'aphya ba'i las byed na byang chub sems dpa' ni mur 'jug dang / theg pa chung ngu ma gnyis byeng ba'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi nang na chos ma yim tshul khrims
332a2(mdo sde): pa yin zhes zer na/ rtag par snying rje bskyed/ ngan pa'i rnams theg pa chen po la yang dag la/ yid ches par bstan cing bslabs pa'i rogs mde la byang chub sems dpa' slar logs
332a3(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas kyi chos la nyes shes bshad na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu la la zhig bdag bstod cing / phar smod pa dang / gzhan la bdag
332a4(mdo sde): bstod// par spong bar ston pa spong ba'i rgyu/ smod pa'i rkyen byed pa/ slong ba'i chos dang / smod pa'i las byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sbyin par smra dbab cing
332a5(mdo sde): ngam sems pa ni bdag gis blangs te// ngag zhing legs pa ni gzhan la sbyin pa'i rigs ma la la zhig gi sa bdag gi legs pa ni bsnyad/ gzhan gyi legs pa
332a6(mdo sde): bcabs te/ gzhan la smang smra bab par byas na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag ser sna che'am/ gzhan ser sna che bar ston tam/ ser sna
332a7(mdo sde): che ba'i rgyu byed dam/ ser sna che ba'i rkyen byang ngam/ ser sna'i chos byed dam/ ser sna'i las byed na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ni bul po 'ongaso cog dang / gzhan ci 'dod pa bzhin
332a8(mdo sde): dgong so// byang chub sems dpa'i sems la ngan tu sems shing / sems la gshe ba dang / dang cha gcig gamakhab gcig gam/ rtswa nyag ma gcig mi ser ram/ chos 'dod
332b1(mdo sde): pazhig 'ongs na/ tshig gcig le'u gcig rdul tsam gyi chos kyang ma bshad la/ slar ngag ngan pas spros te sla bab mngon byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu
332b2(mdo sde): khro 'am/ mi pa log po khro bar ston tam/ khro ba'i rgyu byed dam/ khro ba'i rkyen byed dam/ khro ba'i chos byed dam khro ba'i las byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni thams cad kyi nang na/ dag
332b3(mdo sde): rtsa ba bskyed cing / 'thab cing rtsod pa med par byas la/ rtag par snying rje bskyed cing bya ba'i rigs kyi phyir log par sems can tha~Md kyi nang na/ sems can ma yod pa la khangan pas ga
332b4(mdo sde): zhing lags pas 'chog pa dang / ral gyi dang dbyigs pas gdab cing / 'ardegs kyang snying rtse ma bris te/ pha lo ga bo 'gyod cing tshig 'jam pos 'chags shing / gnod pa
332b5(mdo sde): kyang khro ba'i 'dud pa ma bkrol na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' phas pham pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu la la zhig gis/ dkon mchog gsum la ma yin zhes zer ram/ gzhan da
332b6(mdo sde): mchog gsum la ma yin zhes zer bar bstan tam/ ma yin zhes zer ba'i rgyu dang / rkyen byed dam/ ma yin pa'i chos byed dam/ ma yin pa'i las byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni mu
332b7(mdo sde): 'dug dang / ma rabs kyi nang tshig gcig/ sangs rgyas kyi skad la yin zhes zer ba zhig mthong thos na mdung rtse gsum pa sum brgyas snying la zug pa dang / mtshungs na bdag gi kha
332b8(mdo sde): nas ma yin zhes zer ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ yid ches pa'i sems sro zhu dang / mi 'gal ba'i sems bskyed pa'i rogs na/ slar log par ma rabs log pa la la lta zhing / ma yin zhes
333a1(mdo sde): / grogs byed na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o// dge bzhugs sbyong ba'i rnams ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i so sor thar pa 'ang bslabs pa'i rig so// 'dzi
333a2(mdo sde): nang nas rdul phra mo tsam yang gzhig tu mi rung na/ tshul khrims bcu tshang bar zhig po lta smos kyang ci dgos/ la la zhig gis tshul khrims bshig pa zhig mang ltar gyi lus la
333a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa'i las la ma nus te/ rgyal po'i gral yang stor/ 'khor lo bskor ba'i rgyal po'i gral yang stor dge slong dang / dge slong ma'i gral
333a4(mdo sde): stor g.yos shing phyogs bcu dang / bskyed cing gsol ba bcu dang / chos rdo rje dang mtshungs pa bcu dang / sa ba cu'i sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid rtag pa/ yon tan zab mo la
333a5(mdo sde): sogs pa zad par stor nas/ ngam song gsum du lta nga ste/ bskal pa gnyis gsum gyi bar du pha ma dpang kon mchog gsum gyi ming mkhan kyang mo thos te/ de bas na
333a6(mdo sde): gcig kyang bzhig tu mi rung ngo // khyed la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lobs pa dang / slob pa dang / slob par 'gyur ba'i rnams tshul khrims 'di bcu bslabs la gus pa
333a7(mdo sde): byos te/ rtag par gzungasu gzung ba'i rig so// gsal bar ni le'u brgyad khri'i nang nas rgya cher bshad// sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ phas
333a8(mdo sde): pham pa bcu ni bshang zin to// ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bu rgyal ba'i gral thob pa'i tshe dang / 'khor lo bskor ba'i rgyal po'i gral thob pa'i tshe dang / blom po
333b1(mdo sde): gral thob pa'i tshe dang / sngar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims nong pa'i rig so// 'ung tang lha ma srin thams cad kyang rgyal po'i lus dang / blon po'i lus kyi rim gro dang skyabs bye
333b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thaMd kyang dgye so// tshul khrims thob zin na sri zhu dang / mi 'gal ba'i sems dang / sems la gus par bya ba'i sems dpa' bskyed/ gral mthon po na 'dug pa'i mkham
333b3(mdo sde): dang / slob dpon dang / theg pa chen po la tshangs par spong du mtshungs pa dang / mtshungs par mthong ba dang / las 'thun par byed pa mthong na langs te/ bsu la phyag 'tshal te nad dri
333b4(mdo sde): 'a'i rog so// byang chub sems dpa' slar dregs pa'i sems dang le lo'i sems dang / glen pa'i sems bskyed/ ma langs ma bsu phyug ma byas te/ ji la'ang chos bzhin du rdzas
333b5(mdo sde): dang ri mo dang / bdag gi lus dang / yul mkhar dang // phos mos dang / nor rin po che bdun la sogs te/ nor mo cog btsongs la/ dag so cog ma sbyar te/ de ltar na mu
333b6(mdo sde): na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu la la ched dkar chang 'thung na chang gi nyes pa skyes te/ dge ba'i bsod nams grangs med pa stor to// la la zhig gis bdag gi lus dang / lag gis
333b7(mdo sde): chang snod blangs te/ mi pha rol po la byin te blung na/ tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du log pa med par 'ong ma/ bdag 'thung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'di lta ste/ mi 'o cog thaMd dang / na
333b8(mdo sde): thams cad la chang 'thung bar bstan tu mi rung // bdag rang 'thung ba lta spos kyang ni dgos te/ bdag ched kar 'thungs pa dang / pha rol po la bad ba ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu
334a1(mdo sde): sha ched kar zos pa dang / sha'o cog bzar mi rung ste/ zos na snying rje zhing byams pa'i rang bzhin gyi sa bom chang bas/ son thams cad kyis mthong na 'jigs nas
334a2(mdo sde): de ska bas na byang chub sems dpa' sem gyi sha 'thar mi ru // sha zas pa ni sdig grangs med/ sha zos na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu kub rnam lnga gzar mi rung // klog pa da
334a3(mdo sde): dang rgya sgrog dang / 'i lkog rnams dang / shing kun pAng/ 'di rnams lba kha zas cog gi nang du bzar mi rung ngo // la la zhig che dkar zos na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu sems can
334a4(mdo sde): thams cad kyis tshul khrims brkyang dang / tshul khrims lnga dang / tshul khrims bcu dang / rtsa ba rnam bzhi pashig pa dang / log pa bdun dang / gnod pa brgyad kyi tshul khrims
334a5(mdo sde): ba shis pa sdig byed pa mthong na/ mthol tshangs kyi du gzhug pa'i rigs// de las byang chub sems dpa 'am stan te// mthol tshangs byed ma bcug na/ lhan cig 'a
334a6(mdo sde): 'dug cing / tshangs par sbyong du mtshungs pa'i dge 'dun gyi rnams gcig du tshogs te/ tshul khrims bsha dpa'i tshe// sdig dngosu byung gis/ nyes pa mthol tshangs byed
334a7(mdo sde): du chug shig/ ma gcug na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu mkhan po theg pa chen po la lhan cig tu lta ga lhan cig tu las byed pa/ dge 'dun gyi khang khyim dang / mkhar
334a8(mdo sde): 'ongs pa mthong ma/ rgyang grags stong gi lam na tshur 'ongs na ni bsu/ 'gro ba na bskyal cing phyag 'tshal te/ bkur bsti dang / ri mo dang / nyin cig cing dus gsum du ri mo bya/ 
334b1(mdo sde): ri ma gcig gi zan du gser srang gsum gyi kha zas dang / khri stan dang / chos kyi mkhan po ci 'dod cog dgos kyang kun sbyor te/ byin la rtag par chos kyi mkhan po gnye
334b2(mdo sde): dus sum du chos bsha nyin gcig cing dus gsum du phyag gus par 'tshal la/ khro ba'i sems dang / mya ngan gyi sems mi skye bar bgyiso// chos kyi phyir lus dang / bsngos
334b3(mdo sde): ches gsolo// de ltar ma byas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu gang la yang rung ste/ tshul khrims dang / mdo sde 'chang ba'i khang khyim chen po'i nang na/ chos 'chang ba yod na byang chu
334b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' gsar du slob pa tshul khrims kyi gleg sa bam khyer te/ chos kyi mkhan po'o gan su song la/ gsol te dri zhing mnod pa'i rog so// la la zhig ri dang / 
334b5(mdo sde): dang dkyil gi drung ngag/ dge 'dun gyi sa dang / khyim byi nang dang / chos 'tshad cog gi sar phyin par byas temaHna cing 'jo de'i gan su song sem mnyan ma gnos na ltung ba la
334b6(mdo sde): kyi bus sems ni theg pa chen po dang 'gal zhing / rtag par sangs rgyas kyi yi ge dang / tshul khrims la 'dug kyang / khar smra na sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa ma yin zhes zer ma rtag
334b7(mdo sde): reg pa chung ngu rnam gnyis dang / mur 'dug gi chos la lta zhing / log par lta ba'i cog gi tshul khrims dang / chos kyi yi ge gzungasu bzung na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi
334b8(mdo sde): mi nad kyis bta' bo cog rtag par rim gro byas te/ gsos la sangs rgyas dang mtshungs par byas na/ dge ba'i bsod nams pa brgyad kyi nang ma/ nang pa la lta zhing gses pa'i dge ba'i 'aso
335a1(mdo sde): nams ni bsod nams kyi dam pa'o// pha ma dang / mkhan po dang / dge 'dun dang / slob ma 'am/ dbang po ma tshang gan do cog gis btab cing nyon mongs na kun kyang
335a2(mdo sde): sos par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems can la lta gshe zhing // ngan sems kyis dge 'dun gyi khyim dang / yul 'khar du ma phyin pa// dbyed nga/ ri lung dang mkhar dang tsha
335a3(mdo sde): na mang pa 'dug pa mthong ste/  'da' dang / rim gro ma byas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu ral gyi dang / mnga' gzhu dang / mdung dang / stor la sogs te 'thab mo'i spyang mtshor cha dang
335a4(mdo sde): sems can gsod pa'i spyang dang 'dra ba rgya rgya mo la sogs pa 'chang du mi rung // byang chub sems dpa' ni pha ma gzhan gyis gsad kyang sha mo glan na/ sems can thaMd gas
335a5(mdo sde): pa lta smos kyang ci dgos mtshon ma cha ched kar 'chang ba na ltung ba'o// 'di lta bu'i tshul khrims rnam bcu ni bslabs te/ rtag par gzungasu gzung ba'i rigs
335a6(mdo sde): 'og ma le'u drug gi rang na rgya cher ba shadado// sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bu khyi 'dod pa'i phyir sems ngan pa bsams te/  'og
335a7(mdo sde): gi yul du pho nyar 'drul ba dmag gi g.yul gsham swa te/ dmag bskyong nas 'thabs te/ sa ni mang po bsad na/ byang chub sem+ba dpa' dmag gi nang du song zhing phen tshun du 'drul yang
335a8(mdo sde): rung na cheng kar g.yul gyi dgra byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de la tshod kar byed pa ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu bla 'bangs dang / bran phos mos dang / phyugs dag sna drug dang / gshim
335b1(mdo sde): sgom ro bzhugs pa'i snod la sogs pa khe dang tshang sngogs bdag gis kyang 'gyi ba'i mi rigs na/ gzhan la byed par bstan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ dal ched kar byed pa ni/ 
335b2(mdo sde): ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bus ngan sems bskyed/ pha log po dge ba des pa/ chos kyi mkhan po// dge 'dun rgyal po// ya rabs btsun pa la mnyes par log pa bdun dang / pham pa bcu
335b3(mdo sde): dang pha ma dang khu pho nu bo dang / gnyer ba rnam drug gi tshul khrims bshaM go zhes bskur na/ sri zhu dang mi 'gal zhing / byams shing snying rje'i sems bskyed pa'i rigs kyi/ de la slar log
335b4(mdo sde): pa'i gnod pa bskyed na mi bde ba'i gan su lhung na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems bskyed/ ched kar me chen po btang la/ ri dang tshol dbye dang ri lung dang / dbyar
335b5(mdo sde): zla ra ba ma/ ma chad ston zla tha chungs yan bsregs sam la la zhig gis me btang ste/ gzhan gyi khang khyi ma dang / mkhar dang / grong dang / dge 'dun gyi khyim dang / zhang
335b6(mdo sde): ngang skyeng zhing dang lha ma srin dang / bla'i 'khor la sogs te/ bdag po yod do// cog gi nor rdzas bsreg tu mi ru // la la zhig gis ched kar bsregs na ltung ba'o// sangs rgya
335b7(mdo sde): kyi'u sangs rgyas kyi slob ma/ bdag dang mur 'dug dang / gnyen rnam drug la sogs te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen no cog kun kyang / ci yang theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang / tshul
335b8(mdo sde): khrims nor cing / gzungasu 'dzin par bstan pa'i tshog so// gzhung dang lugs shes shing / byang chub sem+ba da ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / bskyed cing gsol pa'i sems bcu dang / 
336a1(mdo sde): rdo rje'i chos kyi sems g.yo bar bstan te/ gcig nas gcig tu go rims dang / chos kyi cho ga shes par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' la / byang chub sems dpas ngan
336a2(mdo sde): sems dang / zhe sdang bskyed/ gzhan nyan thos theg pa chung ngu rnams gnyis kyi tshul khrims dang / yi ge dang / mur 'dug dang / log par lta ba'i bshad pa bstan pa na ltung ba'o// 
336a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bu legs pa'i sems kyis / sngar theg pa chen po'i go cha dang / tshul khrims dang / yi ge bslabs nas/ rgya cher phye nas gzhung gi ro bro ba shes nas khyeng chub
336a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' gsar du slong pa rgyang grags brgya stong gi la ma nas theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang / tshul khrim 'dod cing 'ong ba mthong mchos kyi phyir dka'i' thub
336a5(mdo sde): sbyod ba chos bzhin bshad pa'i rog so// dkar thub ces bya ba ni lus bsregs galag ngar bsregs pa/ ser mo 'asre gas pa'o// de la lus dang / lag ngar dang / sar ma
336a6(mdo sde): bsregs te/ sang+yas thaMd la yon tu ma gsol na/ de'i rab tu 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ma yino// stag dang sbyang ki dang / seng ge ltogs pa la sogs pa dang / 'dra
336a7(mdo sde): ltogs pa la sogs pa thams cad la lus kyi sha dang / rkang lag pa gtong phod par byas te byin la de nas gcig nas gcig tu/ mthar gyis yang dag pa'i chos
336a8(mdo sde): shang de sems ni phye/ yod ni grol bar bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' bdag gas pa'i khye 'dod pa'i phyir/ lan klan pa'i rig pa ni ma blan gyi yi ge dang / tshul khrims
336b1(mdo sde): dang 'bru phyin ci log tu bshad nas/ snga phyi med par dkon mchog la 'chang ba ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag kha zas dang / nor rdzas dang / gso ba'i khyi dang / mi snyam
336b2(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/ rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po chen po la sogs pa gnyen zhes zer te/ snyems shing nan gyis nor slong la/ bcan ngag gos bsdigs te/ nan gyis nor dang
336b3(mdo sde): khye tshol la cog gi mong ni ngan pa mang ba tshol zhes bya'o// gzhan la yang snying rje med cing/ sr-i zhu dang / mi 'gal ba'i sems yong med par bstan pa ni ltung ba'o// sang+yas
336b4(mdo sde): kyi bu tshul khrims kha don tu klog pa slob na/ nyin gcig cing dus drug tu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims bzung / de'i gzhung dang / don sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid
336b5(mdo sde): shes par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi yon tan tshog cig le'u gcig kyang mi shes par sgyu ma'i tshig tu nus zhes zer ba ni/ bdag la bsdus
336b6(mdo sde): shing bslus/ gzhan la yang bsnyas te/ chos cog rnam pa ga cig kyang mi shes par/ gzhan la mkhan po byed cing tshul khrim ston pa ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan
336b7(mdo sde): sems bskyed/ tshul khrims 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i lag na 'og snod khyer te/ byang chub sems dpa'i las byed pa la/ mthong na phan tshun gnyis kyis rab tu dpar bcug sde 'phag
336b8(mdo sde): pa'i mi la bstas ma shin byed cing // ngan mi byed pa mdo zhes bskur te/ nga lta bu ched kar byas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu snying rje spyad/ tsa'ang mi gsad par btang ba'i las byed cing
337a1(mdo sde): tha ma cag ni bdag gi pha yin/ ma' cog ni bdag gi ma yin 'dag sngon chad kyi tshe rabs la gang skyes cog na yang / de dag las ma skyes pa med pas na/ 
337a2(mdo sde): 'gro ba drug gi sems can bdag gi pha ma yin te/ de bsad cing zos na/ bdag gi pha ma bas // gcig tu na bdag gi lus stongs pa bas // sa dang chu thang ni bdag gi lu
337a3(mdo sde): snga ma yino// me dang rlungo cog ni bdag gi gzugs kyi phyi mo yin pas// rtag par gson par btang ba'i las byed/ khar skyes gar skyes kyang son gsod pa mthong na thabs sbyang
337a4(mdo sde): bdag gis 'or ba dag/  mda' byas te/ nyon mongs shi la 'phongs pa thar pa'o// rtag par byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims pashing bstan bslabs nas/ sani thar pa'i rim
337a5(mdo sde): bya'o/ pha ma dang / bu pho dang / nu bo zhig shin de nyi na bar chos kyi mkhan po gnyer te/ byang chub sem+ba da pa'i tshul khrim pa shad na/ de'i bsod nams kyis shi ba des
337a6(mdo sde): thams cad dang phreng / mtho risu skye'o// de ltar ma byas na ltung ba'o// chos kyi rgya mo// / bal po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o// 'di lta ste tshul khrims 'di bcu bslab na/ sems gus par gzungasu bzung
337a7(mdo sde): ba'i rig so// sdig bkru ba'i le'u yi na nas kyang/ tshul khrims gcig pu gcig pa nas rgya che zhing gsal bar bshad// sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ 
337a8(mdo sde): khros pa'i lan khros pas mi glam 'ardeg pa'i lan brdeg pas mi glan/ pha ma dang / phu nu bo gnyen rnam drug bsad kyang sha glan mi rung // gzhan zhig gis bdag gi rgyal po bsad
337b1(mdo sde): kyang sha glan du mi rung // srog gcad de sha glon na sri nu'i chos dang dag 'o// bran pho mo la ngag ngan pas spyos shing / brdegs la nyin gcig ngan pa rnam gsum bskyod pa la yang sdig grangs med
337b2(mdo sde): mched kar log pa sna bdun gyi sna bdun gyi sdog byas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la snying rje med/ gnyen rnam drug la sogs pa'i sha klan pa
337b3(mdo sde): ched kar byed na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu gdong ma dang po rab tu byung ste ji'ang mi shes par/ bdag dbang po no la 'dzangs pa rlom zhing / la la ni lo grangs rgan zhing phyug gtsan
337b4(mdo sde): pabasnyems te la la rung che zhing thabs mtho ba dang / mang dang / mang du shes pa dang / dbang che ba dang / nor rin po chasna bdun mang du 'dog pas/ rgyag dregs snga ched chos shes
337b5(mdo sde): pa'i mkhan po la yi ge dang tshul khrims mi gsol/ mi nod/ tshod kyi mkhan po la la ni rung chung / la la ni nas gzhom la la ni thabs chung la la ni dbul la la ni
337b6(mdo sde): dbang po ma tshang yang legs pa'i chos dben pa yod/ chos kyi yi ge dang tshul khrim so cog zad par shes na byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slob bo// chos kyi slob dpon ma rigs pa
337b7(mdo sde): dang thabs la 'phral gang du bltas shing / chos kyi mkhan po la yang dag pa'i bden pa gzhung cog gsol zhing / ngan du ma 'ongs na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu/ sangs rgyas 'das pa'i
337b8(mdo sde): phyin/ sems dge bas sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims 'dod cing nong na/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan snga ga 'dag gi sems la yid dam bcas te zhag bdun gyi
338a1(mdo sde): // bar du sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar mthol tshangs byas la/ lhas bzang po mthong ba ni tshul khrims pa'o// ltas bzang ba ma mthong nani// zhag bdun gnyis bdun gsum
338a2(mdo sde): lo gcig gi bar du ltas bzang po mthong ba'i drod kyis bzung // lhas bzang po mthong nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan snga ma tshul khrims man / ltas
338a3(mdo sde): babang po ma mthong na/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar/ tshul khrims gnod kyang / ming tshul khrims thob zhes mi bya'o// la la zhig gis sngon chad byang chub
338a4(mdo sde): sems dpa'i tshul khrims mnos pa'i mdun du nong na/ ltas bzang po mi dgos so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi mkhan po gcig nas gcig tu bstan pas na/ ltas bza
338a5(mdo sde): ngo mi dgos te/ chos kyi mkhan po de'i 'dun du tshul khrims mnos na tshul khrims kyang thob ste/ gu sa pa'i sems skye'o// rgyang grags stong lam tshun chad tshul khrim
338a6(mdo sde): sbyin nus pa'i mkhan po mang la/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar/ tshul khrims nong ma ltas bzang ba mthong bar dgos// chos kyi mkhan po la la
338a7(mdo sde): zhig/ bdag theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang tshul khrims shes pa dang rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po rnams byams shing 'dza' ba bsnyems te/ byang chub sems dpa' gsar du
338a8(mdo sde): slob pa/ chos kyi yi ge'i lugs dang / tshul khrims kyi gzhung 'dri 'ongs pa la brnyas pa'i sems dang / ngan pa'i sems dang / le lo'i sems kyis/ gcig pu gcig pu nas 'a
338b1(mdo sde): ba'i lan ma bla na na ltung ba'o sangs rgyas kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / tshul khrims kyi yi ge dang / theg pa chen po'i drang ba'i chos/ drang por mthong ba/ drang po'i ngo bo nyid/ drang po'i
338b2(mdo sde): chos kyi lus kyis/ 'grus par slob cing sbyong sgom mi nus pa rnams ni/ dkon mchog bdun bdun btang ste/ slar log par bltas te/ theg pa chu ngu pa rnam gnyis dang / mur 'dug
338b3(mdo sde): gi chos dang / ma rabs kyi gzhung la bsten po dang / a bi la dar ma bshad pa/ slob pa dang / theg pa chu ngu'i yi ge dang / 'dug par slob na/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi ngo ba nyid kyi sa bon chad bas
338b4(mdo sde): lam 'gog pas bsgribs pa'i rgyu rkyen gyis byang chub sems dpa'i lam ma yi no// de lta bu tshong kar byas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu/ sangs rgyas 'das pa'i phyi mchos
338b5(mdo sde): 'chang pa bdag po byang ba dang / dge 'dun gyi khyim bdag po dang / ston cing 'phrul pa'i bdag pod pa bsam gtan tu 'jug pa'i bdag po dang / 'gro zhing 'ongs
338b6(mdo sde): pa'i bdag po dang / de lta bu byed na/ byams pa'i sems bskyed la// mi mdza' ste 'thab cing rtsod pa yang / dge bar bsdam pa'i rigs/ dkon mchog gsum gyi nor yang dge bar bsrung
338b7(mdo sde): te ma 'ongs par mi skyed/ bdag gis bdag gi skor ba'ab dang / mtshungs par bya'o// de la las logs par mang po 'grub cing 'bang pa dang / rang nyams kyi sems kyis/ dkon mchog
338b8(mdo sde): gsum gyi nor sbyang na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu sngan chang dge 'dun gyi khyim gyi nang na 'dug la/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge slong 'dren pa zhig phyis dge 'dun gyi khang khyim
339a1(mdo sde): mkhar dang / grong dang / rgyal po'i khyim dang / dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i tshe dang / 'khor gyi nang du 'ongs pa mthong na/ snga na 'dug pa'i dge 'dun gyis na ni bsu/ 'gro na ni bskyal
339a2(mdo sde): te zas kyi sgo steng dang khang khyim dang / nyal ba'i mal cha dang khri dang / sA snga nas sbyar te sbyin mo la la zhig bdag la nor med na/ bdag gis lus dang / bu pho dang bu mo dang / btsongs
339a3(mdo sde): te ci 'dod pa kun sbyar te sbyin dgos te/ sbyin bdag la la zhig 'ongs te/ dge 'dun phal dang / dge 'dun gyi 'dron pa zhig gnyer te/ yon gyi nor skal pa yod pa'i sar dge 'dun gyi khyim
339a4(mdo sde): bdag pos dge 'don 'dron pa'i rnam rig kyis gnyer ba btang ste/ de las dge 'dun snga nas 'dug pas/ bdag 'ba' shig gnyer bar song ste/ dge 'dun 'dron pa ma btang na/ dge
339a5(mdo sde): 'dun gyi khyim gyi bdag po sdig grangs med par thob ste/ byol song dang mtshungaso// dge sbyong ma yin/ shAkya'i rigs kyi sa bon yang ma yin te/ da ltar byas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas
339a6(mdo sde): kyi bu ci yang go rim su ma bab par logs shig tu yon blangs shing / bdag gir bkur du ma ru // de lta bu'i yon gyi nor rdzas mi phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun dbang ste/ de la la
339a7(mdo sde): shig tu mnos shing khyer na phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gyi nor bdag gi sgor khyer na bsod nams rnam pa brgyad dang / sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa'i rnam dang / mkhan po dang / 
339a8(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang / pha ma dang / nang pa'i rdzas bdag gis spyod kyis ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dang / rab tu ma byung ba'i sbyin bdag gi dge 'dun ga
339b1(mdo sde): te/ bsod nams bskyed cing smon lam gsol nas/ dge 'dun gyi nang du song na/ dge bskos la dris te/ de rang go rims gang la bab pa gnyer na/ phyogs bcu'i 'phrul gyi dge 'dun
339b2(mdo sde): 'thob po// gud nas dgra bcom pa dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge 'dun lnga bcu gnyer ba bas/ go rimasu bab pa'i dge 'dun tha mal ba gcig gnyer ba bsod nams
339b3(mdo sde): che'o// de las dge 'dun gzhan gnyer ba ni/ mur 'dug ngan pa'i cho so// sangs rgyas 'dun la ni gud na/ gnyer ba'i chol medo// sri zhu'i lam dang 'gal bas/ gung nas dge 'dun
339b4(mdo sde): gnyer ba ni ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu/ ngan sa mas snang/ gso ba'i khye'i phyir/ phas mos kyi g.yem pa mchong ba'i bdag dar cing zan byed pa dang / bdag 'du
339b5(mdo sde): thos mos kyi mtshan lha mo lam bzang ngan 'gro la/ pho zhes zer/ log pa'i chos kyi bsngags sgyu ma rang 'azor zer dgra bslab pa'i chos byed/ du go cog sbyor zhing byed la dri
339b6(mdo sde): ci rnam pa brgyad stong byed sbrul dug/ gser dngul ma btul ba'i dug dang / byad skye ma la sogs pa/ snying rje yod med pa lta bu/ ched kar byas na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan
339b7(mdo sde): sems bskyed/ bdag gi lus kyis dkon mchog gsum la skur byas te/ gzhan la gnyen sgyu ma smos te kha ni stong pa 'cha las ni yod pa'i las byed/ tha mal ba'i bud med dang
339b8(mdo sde): skyes pa'i smyan byed cing / mi tshangs par spyod par sbyor te/ tsa la yang mi 'jigs shing chags pa med/ dus drug tu mchod ston byed pa'i nyi ma dang / lo gcig la zla ba gsum gsum
340a1(mdo sde): mchod ston rtag tu byed pa'i tshe/ sems can gsod rkun po dang chom po byed cing / mchod ston gyi tshul khrims bshig pa ni ldang ba'o// tshul khrims 'di bcu
340a2(mdo sde): bslabs la/ rtag par gzungasu gzung ba'i rogaso// khrim bzung ba'i le'u gyi nang nas kyang rgya cher mngon par bshad// sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pA/ sangs rgyas 'das pa'i phyin
340a3(mdo sde): ngan pa'i dus la mur 'dug dang / mi ngan pa'o cog dang rkun po chen po sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' pha ma dang / mtshungs pa'i gzugs 'tshong ba mthong ngam/ chos
340a4(mdo sde): ngang tshul khrims kyi yi gri 'tshong ba mthong ngam/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma 'tshong ngam/ gcig tu sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'tshong ba dag pa la zhig snying rje
340a5(mdo sde): las la mngags pa'i 'brang nas/ bran po bra na mor byas pa zhig/ byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu mthong na byams pa'i sems skye'o// thabs kyi ra mda' dang skyab
340a6(mdo sde): byas te/ gnas gnas na mgong do cog kyang / slar slob cing ston cig/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / chos dang / tshul
340a7(mdo sde): khrims kyi yi ge thams cad nor yod ma nor gyis lus shig de ltar ma blus na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu/ 'chang du mi gnang ba la mtshon cha dang / mnga' gzhu 'chang ba dang
340a8(mdo sde): tshong spogs byed pa dang / srang dang bre chung 'chang ba dang / rtsa lag skems shing mi gzhan la nor len pa dang / sems la phrag dog byed de/ pha log po bcings grags byas pa dang
340b1(mdo sde): ngos so don du yod pa zhig btang khyi la dang sel byi dang khyi dang phag dang / bya 'chang zhig gsor mi rung // de lta bu ched kar gso na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems bsku
340b2(mdo sde): phos mos la sogs pa 'thab bo cog la lta ba dmag gi g.yul dang / dgra chom po byed pa la sogs pa las bltar mi rlu // yang gicig tu dung 'bud pa dang / rnga gling dang / 
340b3(mdo sde): gyim shir dang / dzang dang / gling bu dang / kong hi'u dang / glu len pa dang / rol mo'i sgra la mnyan tu mi rung ngo // cho rdo dang / mig mangs dang / par rtsig gi rtsed mo dngar 'dri lug
340b4(mdo sde): dmag gi rtsed mo dang / pho long rdob pa dang / rdo la len gyis rtse ba dang / bum bu la 'di bu 'phen pa dang / khras byengad pa dang / me long 'brung ba byang mi rung// rtsa ci che'u dang / rgya ca
340b5(mdo sde): dang phor bu kha rub dang / mo 'thod pa dang / de na mas la mo gdab tu mi rung // rkun po'i than gyi pho nya la sogs pa gcig kyang byar mi ru // de ltar ched kar byas ma
340b6(mdo sde): ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu tshul khrims thub par gzung ba'i rim gro byas na/ 'gro nyal 'dug langs dang / nyin mtshan dus drug tu tshul khrims kha ton klogs ma rdo rje
340b7(mdo sde): mtshung so// rgyal ba thogs pa mtsho chen po rgal ba dang mtshung so// gcig tu na dge slong rtses bcings pa dang mtshungs te/ theg pa chen po la dge zhing yid ches pa'i sems ca
340b8(mdo sde): par bskyed la bdag gis shes par bsam pa nga ni/ da dung sangs rgya sum phyin pa'i sangs rgyaso// sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams ni sangs rgya su phyin pa'i sangs rgyaso snyam du
341a1(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed/ bar mi chang bar sems la bsams la/ de la skad cig gcig theg pa chungangu gnyis dang / mur 'dug la sems kyis bsam ni ltung
341a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bu/ rtag par smon lam thad gsol la/ pha ma dang mkhan po dang / dge 'dun dang / dkon mchog gsum la sri zhu che zhing yid dang mi 'gal bar smon/ rtag par
341a3(mdo sde): mkhan po mkhas pa dang / tshangs par spong du mtshungs pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad de/ rtag par bdag theg pa chen po'i yo ge dang khrims dang / g.yo zhing phyogs pa
341a4(mdo sde): bcu dang / chos rdo rje dang / mtshungs pa bcu dang / sa bcu la sog sa pa bdag bye zhing shes la/ chos bzhin du las byed bar smon to// sangs rgyas kyi bu tshul khrims bzu
341a5(mdo sde): la sram thub par bya bar bya ba ni bskyed cing gso gso ba bcu dang lus dang srog kyang bor te/ sems dpa'i bar mi bcang bar sems bas mo// de la byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md 'di lta bu
341a6(mdo sde): smon lam ma bskyed na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu smon lam chen po bcu smon pa'i 'og tu/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims gzung su bzung ste/ smon lam 'di bzhin du gang po// bdag gi lus
341a7(mdo sde): 'di me chen po'i tshig kyang rung khung zab mo dang ral gyi ril song yang rung ste/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi dam pa'i chos kyi yi ge dang / tshul khrims mthar mi zhig pa dang / nam
341a8(mdo sde): du yang mi zhig par bud med thaMd la sogs pa/ mi byed par smon to// gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to// lugs bsregs pa'i dri ba dang / de ltar bu rgya mo rim pa stong gis bska
341b1(mdo sde): telus dkris kyang thar yun tu tshul khrims dral ba'i lus kyis/ dad pa'i sbyin bdag gi go sa thad mi bgo bar smon to// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to// kha 'di'i nang du lus
341b2(mdo sde): kyi thu lum bsregs pa dang / me chu bzhin du bab ste 'ong ba la bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du lon kyang tshul khrims bshig pa'i khas dad pa'i sbyin bdag gis zas thad mi zo ba
341b3(mdo sde): smon te// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smin to// lus 'di me chen pos bsregs lcags kyi dra ba dang / lcags bsregs pa'i tshe ba'i steng du bskal kyang tshul khrim dral ba'i lus
341b4(mdo sde): kyis ngang pa'i sbyin bdag gi khri'o cog gi steng du mi 'dug par smin to// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di skal pa gcig gnyis kyi bar du/ mdung rtse kha gsum brgyas gcags kyang rung
341b5(mdo sde): ste mthar tshul khrims pashig pa'i lus kyis/ dad pa'i sbyin pa ngag gi rtsi sman thams cad ma za bar smon to// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to// lus 'di bskal pa sto
341b6(mdo sde): gi bar du lcags kyi zangs po che tsha ba'i nang du bcug kyang rung ste/ mthar tshul khrims 'di 'dral ba'i lus kyis/ dad pa'i skyon bdag gi khang khyi mo cog dang / ldum ra dang / skyed shing dang / zhing
341b7(mdo sde): gi steng du mi 'dug par smon to// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to// lus 'di mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du lug kyi gtun pas rdungs te/ dul phra mo bzhin du song yang khrims dral ba'i lus
341b8(mdo sde): yid ches pa'i skyon bdag gis 'grus shing gus par phyag mi 'tshal bar smon to// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smin to// stong phrag brgya'i lcags bsregs pa'i ral gyi dang
342a1(mdo sde): // mdung ces mig gnyis brus shing gcags kyang tshul khrims pashig pa'i sems kyis// pha log kyi kha dag bzang ba la mi lte bar sman te// yang gcig tu smon lam
342a2(mdo sde): 'di ltar smon tan te// yang gcig kyi skyeng bu stong phrag brgyas bskal pa gcig gnyis kyi bar du lus kyi chu ba dang / rna ba'i rtsa bar bcugs kyang / tha mar khrims dral ba'i sems kyis rol
342a3(mdo sde): mo snyan pa la mi nyan par smon to// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di lta bur smin to// bskal pa stong phrag brgya'i bar du ral gyis sna bcad cing gshegs kyang / khrom dral ba'i sems kyis sbas
342a4(mdo sde): cog la mo snom par smon to// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to// bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du lce ral gyis bcad gtubs kyang khrims dral ba'i sems kyis/ ma'o cog
342a5(mdo sde): bi kha zas gtsang ma'o cog la mi bza' bar smon to// yang gcig tu sngon lam 'di ltar smon to// sta ri rnon pos lus bcad gtubs kyang mthar khrim+bu dral ba'i se
342a6(mdo sde): kyis reg pa'i 'azang po la mi bsam ma chags par smon to// yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon te// san na cog sangs rgya su yod par smon to// byang chub sem dpa' 'di lta bu'i smon
342a7(mdo sde): ma bskyed na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag par dus gnyi su sbyangs pa'i yan tan pa dgun dang / dbyar bsam gtan du 'jug pa dang / tshul khrim su 'jug pa so shing dang / sran phye
342a8(mdo sde): chos gos gsum dang / ril ba dang / lhung bzed dang / gting ba dang / gsol byed dang / phog bor dang / chu chags dang / lag phyis dang / gri dang / gtsug shing / gtsug bstan dang / 
342b1(mdo sde): slang tsher dang / tha gu'i khri dang / dar ma dang khrims dang / sadus kyi bu sbyangs pa'i yon tan sbyang pa'i ma grong rgyu ba'i tshe/ 'gro zhing 'ongs na/ rgyang grags brgya stong du 'gro na/ yo byad bcu
342b2(mdo sde): brgyang rtag par lus dang mi 'bral te/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan pa ni dpyod zla ra ba ches bco lnga nas/ dpyid zla tha chungs tshes bco lnga'i bar du'o// ston zla 'bring po che bco lnga nas// 
342b3(mdo sde): dgun zla ra ba nyi'i bar du dus gnyi su yo byad bco brgyad lus dang mi 'bral/ dper bya'i 'dab ma dang 'dra'o// de ste gso sbyin gyi nyi ma la gsar du slob pa'i byang chub sems
342b4(mdo sde): dpa' rnams zla ba phyed phyed cing / kha ton du phas pa ma pa bcu dang / ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi kha don du lhogs shig/ de ste khrim klogs pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas tha~Mng byang chub
342b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' thams cad kyi gzugs kyi spyan sngar ba/ thugs dang / gzugs snyan gyi spyan sngar mi gcig gi kha ton klags la/ gcig gis 'brel tshang bya ste/ gcigs
342b6(mdo sde): gnyis sam gang yang rung ste/ stong brgyad yang mi gcig gis kha ton klog/ kha ton klog pa ni sa mthon po la 'dug la/ nyan pa ni dma' ba la 'dug/ so so nas chos gos tshal bu
342b7(mdo sde): dgu pa dang / lnga pa dang / bdun pa dgos te/ tshul du 'jug pa ni gcig nas gcig tu chos bzhin du'o// sbyang pa'i yon tan spyod pa'i tshe/ bgeg yod cing mi bde ba'i nang du ma
342b8(mdo sde): 'gro shig/ yul gyi bgegs dang / rgyal po mi srur pa dgas mthon dman dang dang / rtsi shing zab mo dang / dbyar seng ge dang / stag dang / sbyang ki dang / chu ste rlung gi bgegs dang / rkun

343a2(mdo sde): chos 'di bzhin du rim pas 'khod cig/ tshul khrim sngar nos pa ni sngar 'dug shog/ tshul khrims phyis nos pa ni phyis nas 'dug zhig/ rgan gzhon mi blta// dge
343a3(mdo sde): slong pho dang / dge slong mo dang / ya rabs dang / btsun pa dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / nyung grub dang / bran phos mos la sogs pa/ tshul khrim+ba nos pa ni sngar 'dug shog/ phyis
343a4(mdo sde): rnas pa ni phyis gro rims bzhin du 'dug shig mur 'dug ngan pa dang / mi glen pa bzhin du rgan yang rung // gzhon yang rung / snga meng phyi med pa'i go rims med pa ni/ 
343a5(mdo sde): g.yung po bran gyi chos song sadus kyi chos kyi na ni snga ma ni steng du 'dug khyim ni 'og du 'dug byang chub sem+b+ha dpa' ni chos bzhin du go rim su ma 'khod na ltung
343a6(mdo sde): ba'ongs rgyas kyi bu rtag par sem can cog bstan cing bcos te/ dge 'dun gyi khang khyim byed cing ro dang / tshal dang / rab dang / zhing la sang+yas kyi rten gyi khyang pa byas la dbyar dkun du
343a7(mdo sde): tshul dang / bsam gtan du 'jug pa'i gnas dang / gtsang ma'i 'chags 'dzug su bzhugs pa'i rog so// de la byang chub sems dpa' senan cag gi phyir theg pa chen po'i chu
343a8(mdo sde): ngang tshul khrims kyi yi ge dkrol bshangad na nam na tsha byung ba dang / yul gyi bgegs dang dgra'i bgegs dang / pha ma dang / phu nu dang / mkhan po la sogs pa thog ma shi ba'i
343b1(mdo sde): dus dang / bdun gsum gyi nyi ma dang / bdun bzhi yi nyi ma dang / bdun lnga'i nyo ma dang / 'dun bdun gyi nyi ma la/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang / tshul khrim bkrol ba shad

343b3(mdo sde): nag po chen pos grub bus pa dang / cang po dang / mtsho chen po'i dgra'i bgegs la sog te/ sdig cog bgegs dang lan gyi na/ 'tsham med pa bdun/ bgeg brgyad lag sgril/ rkang sgrol

343b7(mdo sde): tshul khrom shig sbyin na bye brag dbye zhing bdam du mi rung / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po chen po dang blon po phal dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / 
343b8(mdo sde): g.ye mo g.yem dang / gzugs kyi gnas bco brgyad dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnam drug dang / dbang po med pa dang / dbang po rnam gnyis yod pa dang / nyung rum dang bran
344a1(mdo sde): / 'os mos dang / lha ma srin la sogs te/ thad kun khrim mno du rung // lus la chos kyi gos bgo ba rnams ni kha dag bsgyur bar ston la/ tshwa dang mthun par gyis
344a2(mdo sde): shig/ kha dog ser po sngon po/ nag go dmar po la ma gos yan chad kha dog bsgyur// lus la glo gso cog chos te kha dog bsgyur cig yul cog nang na mi'i gosu bgo ba la/ dge slong tsa
344a3(mdo sde): si gos mi tha mal pa'i gos dang mi mthu mo// thog ma tshul khrim sbyin pa'i la khan pos dri ba khyed che 'di la log pa 'dun gyi sdig byas sam zhes dris shig dang / chos kyi mkhan
344a4(mdo sde): byang chub sen+ta dpa' ni/ log pa bdun byas pa la tshul khrims sbyin du mi ru nga // log pa 'dun zhes byas 'dis ngas rgyas kyi lus la khrag phyung ba dang / pha ma dang / mkhan po da
344a5(mdo sde): slob dpor bsad pa dang / lus kyi tshul khrims gtsang ma bshog pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba pa'i 'pha gas pa 'asad pa yin te/ 'di rnam 'dun tshang bar byas te/ bsgrib
344a6(mdo sde): pa'i tshul la tshul khrim sbyin du mi ru'o// gzhan ni thaMd kyang tshul khrims sbyin du ru// rab tu byung ba'i chos ni rgyal po la yang phyag mi 'tshal/ pha ma la yang phyag mi 'tshal// gnyen pa rnam pa
344a7(mdo sde): drug la yang rjes mi bye lha mo srim la yang phyag mi 'cha'o// chos kyi mkhan 'o skang shes pa shig / rgyang grag stong gi lam nas 'ong ste/ khrims gsol ba zhig yod na byang chub sems dpa'
344a8(mdo sde): kyi mkhan pos ngan sem+ba dang khro ba'i sems bskyed/ sen no cog la tshul khrim ma byin na ltung ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu la bstan bcos te yod ches pa'i sems g.yo bar bya na/ byang chub se
344b1(mdo sde): dpas gzhan tshul khrim bstan pa'i chos kyi mkhan po byas te tshul khrims mnod du 'ong ba mi zhig mthong ma sngar mkhan po slob dpan gnyer du thong shig/ mkhan po gnyis kyis kyang khye
344b2(mdo sde): la bdun gyis bsgribs pa'i sdig yod dam dris shog// de la yang tshe'ang la bdun gyis bsgribs pa'i sdig yod na/ mkhan pos tshul khrim sbyin pa'i mo rig so// 'dun gyis bsgrubs
344b3(mdo sde): pa'i sdig med mtshul khrims skyon du ru // la la zhig gis tshul khrims bcu gzhig pa yong ma mthol tshangs byed du chug shig/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i zhal snga
344b4(mdo sde): nyin mtshan drug du pham pa bcu dang / ltung ba 'a ni bcu rtsa brgyad kyi tshul khrim kha don tu klags la/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas la sems thag pa nas phyag 'tshal ba'i tshe lcas
344b5(mdo sde): bzang por bya ga so// de la nyi ma bdun dang / bdun ga nyis dang / bdun gsum dang / lo gcig tshun chad lta/ sa bzang po mthong dgo so// ltas bzang po zhes bya ba ni/ 
344b6(mdo sde): shegs te/ spyi bo la byugs te/ 'od mthong ba dang / me tog mthong ba dang / lhas ci yang rung / bzang po mthong na/ mod la sdig 'bye'o// de la ltas bzang po med na/ 'bol tshangasu
344b7(mdo sde): zin kyang mo phan nying 'tshe lus kyis mi tshul khrim ma thob bo// lo dang nyams bstan te skabs te byas la lhas 'ong byung ba bdag mthong ma tshul khrim mnang du n+do/ la la zhig
344b8(mdo sde): ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad ba shig pa ni/ 'thol tshangs byas pa'i mong la 'byung ste/ bdun gyis bsgribs pa dang mi tshung so// de bas na tshul khrims ston pa'i mkhan pos ma
345a1(mdo sde): / 'di nang nas kyang / gcig nas gcig nas khrel na mkhan po bya'o// theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang / tshul khrims yang ba dang / lci ba dang / yin pa dang / ma yin pa'i gzug
345a2(mdo sde): dma' mi shes ma gzhung gi mchog bden pa dang / snga ma'i rang bzhin gyi sa bon dang / da ltar bskyed cing gsil ba'i rang bzhin dang / gtan ma rlag pa'i rang bzhin dang / chos kyis

345a5(mdo sde): ngan pa tsal te mo shes pa la sgyu mar chos dang / chu la khrims kyi yo ge kun shes zhes zer zhing // yo na len pa'i bdag la yang bslus shing kharnyas gcig tu

345a7(mdo sde): mdun du mur 'dug dang / ma rabs kyi mdun du sangs rgyas stong gi tshul khrims chen po 'di bshad du mi rung // log par lta ba'i mdun du mi rung // rgyal por ma gtogs pa gzhan su

345b1(mdo sde): rdo shing dang mtshungs/ sems med de/ ming chos log pa zhes bya'o// log pa la lta ba'i rnams ni shing du ma dang mtshung so// byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu ngan pa'i mdun du/ sangs

345b3(mdo sde): bskyed/ 'phags pa'i tshul khrims gshig ma sbyin bdag go cog gi yon slang du ni mi rung // gcig tu na rgyal po'i khab kyis ris la yang 'gror mi rung / rgyal po'i tshul yang

345b8(mdo sde): bris te/ rtag par rin po che sna bdun dag/ rin med po'i spos dang / me tog la sogs mtshan po che sna tshogs kyi gze ba dang / snod byas te/ nang du chos kyi yi ge tshul khrim gyi bres

346a3(mdo sde): shig na yang sems la bsam khar smras te/ khyod ni byol song na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni ri lung dbye thang la gnas kyang rung ste/ sems cad cog kun byang chub sems dpa'i sems

347a1(mdo sde): sems can dmyal bar song yang bla'i/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la tshig gcig ngan du zer ba'i skad ni mi thos par smon to// bdag nyid kyis tshul khrims bshog
